DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether annual application three ( 3 ) fluoride varnish dos two week least effective reduce cavity current semi-annual application .
DOC.brief_title: Yakima Head Start Fluoride Varnish Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study population consist pre-school age child resident Yakima County , central Washington State . Children recruit non-migrant Head Start program ethnic minority farmworker child Yakima Valley . This study randomize , double blind trial one experimental one standard treatment group . Each participant randomly assign one two study group . The participant personnel conduct study know study group participant assign . This trial two study group : 1 . Massive Dose ( Experimental ) : Annually three year , child experimental group receive three .30ml application 50mg NaF/mL fluoride varnish ( CavityShieldÒ , Omni ) , follow 6 month later three .30ml application placebo varnish two week . There 18 visit entire duration study . Each participant receive dental exam annually . 2 . Semiannual Dose ( Standard ) : Annually three year , child standard treatment group receive one .30ml application 50mg NaF/mL fluoride varnish ( CavityShieldÒ , Omni ) two .30ml application placebo varnish two week . They receive regimen 6 month later . There 18 visit entire duration study . Each participant receive dental exam annually . Both experimental standard treatment child receive basic restorative dental care decayed surface , well toothbrushes duration study period . Parents fill questionnaire behavior diet , hygiene prior dental care . Results inform future treatment regimens high-caries-risk population .
DOC.criteria: Age 3671 month Enrolled participate Head Start Center Plan stay Yakima County duration study One sound tooth surface present No teeth present Developmentally unable give oral assent
